Rules.InvariantScript:
SortByColumns(
    Search(
        Filter(
            'Available physical aggregate  (mserp)',
            'Company Code' = Lower(selectedCompanyCode)
        ),
        TextInput_ProductSearch.Text,
        mserp_displayproductnumber,
        mserp_name
    ),
    "mserp_displayproductnumber"
)

If(IsBlank(selectedCompanyCode), 
Notify("Please select a legal entity.", NotificationType.Warning),
Navigate(Settings_siteWhs, ScreenTransition.None))

If(IsBlank(selectedCompanyCode), 
Notify("Please select a legal entity.", NotificationType.Warning),
Navigate(Settings_siteWhs, ScreenTransition.None))
